Name: Russian Bride
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
7.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with a dusting of chocolate powder.
Review: A little on the sweet side for some but vanilla, coffee and chocolate smoothed with cream is a tasty combination.
History: Created in 2002 by Miranda Dickson, A.K.A. the Vodka Princess, for the UK's Revolution bar chain, where some 500,000 were sold each year.
Nutrition: One serving of Russian Bride contains 255 calories
